message: I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting 60%.  I think this is a fair starting point, but I'm open to negotiation.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair. It's a good compromise that still gives you a significant share.
Let's split it evenly this time.  It's clear we're not going to agree on a big difference, so I think a 50/50 split is the best way to get this done before the money keeps shrinking.
